name: swordbattlev2
description: Swordbattle.io is a multiplayer game where players fight each other with different 2D swords, and try to gain coins. The more coins you have, the bigger and powerful you get! Try to become the biggest of them all.

scripts.dev:core: yarn workspaces foreach -A -p -i -j unlimited --include "{server,client}" run dev
scripts.dev:full: yarn workspaces foreach -A -p -i -j unlimited --include "{server,client,api}" run dev
scripts.docker:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml up -d --build
scripts.docker:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.prod.yml up -d --build
scripts.deps:check: yarn dedupe && yarn npm audit --environment production --severity moderate
